name: Disco Viking
description:
Game made for the Ludum Dare 46.

They say it’s closing time for the clubs… But NAY! Bjorn the DISCO VIKING will fight to keep the party going, FOREVER!

Move to the rhythm with Keyboard arrows and WASD to dance around! And dance with bummed out people to spread the Disco fever and keep Disco Alive!

More on the Ludum Dare Page:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46/disco-viking

Credits:
 - Music by @Funto
 - Programmers/vfx artists/graphics @Otakode, @Khayzo, @Draedrus
 - Game Designer @Blink_gd
 - Art, 3D modeling @smatcher, @Jetiste
